DESCRIPTION: Reset the VOICE XP for a member, role, or the entire server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}xpresetvoice** ~ Resets the entire servers Voice XP.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}xpresetvoice @role** ~ Reset the Voice XP for all members that have this role.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **This is a very powerful and dangerous command. Please use wisely. Once XP is reset, it can not be restored.**
ALIASES: Xpresetvoice does not have any aliases.
MEMBER: The Voice XP has been reset for {{member}}.
PATIENCE: Please hold on, this can take a while... I will let you know once it is complete.
ROLE: The Voice XP has been reset for all members that have the {{role}} role.
ALL: The Voice XP has been reset for every member on the server.
